meanings.sent1: The cumulated toys in the box made it difficult to close.
meanings.sent2: The cumulated leaves in the yard needed to be raked.
meanings.sent3: The cumulated socks in the drawer seemed to have a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her cumulated knowledge on the subject impressed the professor.
meanings.sent5: The cumulated dust on the shelves revealed how long it had been since they were cleaned.

meanings.sent1: The cumulated amount of money in their savings account was enough for a vacation.
meanings.sent2: The cumulated efforts of the team led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent3: The cumulated flavors in the dish created a unique taste sensation.
meanings.sent4: His cumulated experience in the field made him a valuable asset to the company.
